Package ch.codebulb.crudfaces.component

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FormLayout
    A container component to apply implicitly "form-like" (e.g. label / input / message) grid styling of its child components using a (responsive) CSS layout with out-of-the-box support for Bootstrap responsive form grid CSS classes.
    IncludeMainCss
    A simple helper JSF component whose only job is to include CrudFaces' main CSS file for a web page.
    IncludeMainJs
    A simple helper JSF component whose only job is to include CrudFaces' main JavaScript file for a web page.
    ReadOnly
    A componenthandler tag which turns all (deep) nested input components into <h:outputText> components, thus rendering the "read only" equivalent.
    ReadOnlyOutputText
    A helper component which is used by ReadOnly to replace an original read/write input component by its read-only equivalent.
